channel.title: Morris Animal Refuge
channel.description: The Morris Animal Refuge is a 501(c)(3) open admission shelter dedicated to helping the homeless, abandoned and unwanted pets of the Philadelphia region. Founded in 1874 by Elizabeth Morris, we were the first organization dedicated to sheltering and rehoming pets, and continue that legacy today by providing adoptions, a low-cost spay/neuter program, fostering, humane education and more.

item.title: Puppy and Kitten Tote
item.description: Show off your love for animals with this fun tote bag! Those faces are too cute to pass up.

item.title: Morris Pet Treat
item.description: Treat the furry friend in your life to a Morris Animal Refuge snack! It’s delicious taste makes it the perfect reward.

item.title: Morris Iconic Blue Mug
item.description: Show your love for all animals with this blue Morris Animal Refuge mug! The cute design is sure to start your day off right.

item.title: Matching Winter Hat
item.description: Make you and your pet the envy of everyone you see with these matching winter hats! They’ll keep you warm and stylish!

item.title: Morris Blue Magnet
item.description: Show your support for Morris Animal Refuge by adding it to your fridge or car! Like all our products, the proceeds will benefit the animals.

item.title: Morris Bunny Pin
item.description: Add this adorable bunny pin to your bag or clothing to support the animals of Morris Animal Refuge! The bunnies will thank you!

item.title: Matching Keyring and Pet Tag
item.description: Accessorize right by matching with your pet! This matching keyring and pet tag set are sure to impress all your friends.

item.title: Christmas Postcard
item.description: Purchase this festive postcard to send to family and friends this holiday season! The adorable animals of Morris Animal Refuge will bring cheer to everyone.

item.title: Matching Hoodie
item.description: Sport a matching hoodie with your pet so everyone knows who you’re with! They keep you warm and show your support for your favorite animal refuge!

item.title: Morris Puppy T-Shirt
item.description: Support Morris Animal Refuge with your pets wardrobe! This t-shirt is right for an furry friends in your life.
